title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\CreateCustomClassRequest
name: CreateCustomClassRequest
description:
Message sent by the client for the CreateCustomClass method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.CreateCustomClassRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The parent resource where this custom class will be created. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/customClasses Speech-to-Text supports three locations: global, us (US North America), and eu (Europe). If you are calling the speech.googleapis.com endpoint, use the global location. To specify a region, use a regional endpoint with matching us or eu location value.

params.name: data.custom_class_id
params.description: Required. The ID to use for the custom class, which will become the final component of the custom class' resource name. This value should restrict to letters, numbers, and hyphens, with the first character a letter, the last a letter or a number, and be 4-63 characters.
